title: Dr Leakey and the dawn of man
creator_credit: Nicolas Noxon and National Geographic Society
brief_description: Highlights the discoveries of Dr Leakey and their implications for the study of human origins. Traces the development of the first theories about both the emergence of humans and their place of origin and examines the application of modern technology to the study of anthropology. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
